Goat rearing is a very easy business, but we have to take special care of many important things in it. These are something like this. 
 
1 For goat rearing, the first thing to be kept in mind is that the goats should be kept on solid ground where there is no moisture. Keep them in a place that is ventilated and clean. 
 2 Be sure to include green fodder in the fodder of goats. Green fodder is very beneficial for goats 
 3 Keep the goats away from the rain as constant drenching in water is harmful for the goats. 
 4 Three things are very important for goat rearing: 
 1 Money: Nothing happens without money and in the same way money is very important for goat farming. Even if you start small. 
 2 Place: Choose a good place for goats, but remember that if the place is your own, it will be better. For these, 1 to 2 acres of land is required. Goat rearing on rent is not proper and is very expensive. 
 3 Patience: It is very important for you to have patience in this business. You cannot make profits in this immediately, for that you have to wait for 1 to 2 years. It also depends to a great extent on the breed of goat, in how much time you start making profits. 
 
 5 Goat rearing requires close attention to goats. If you take good training then you will understand at a glance who is sick and who is fine. 
 
 6 Goats need to be taken care of. Whenever she is sick, she first stops eating and drinking. In such a situation, keep taking veterinary advice as well.
